title: Set Free: Kylie's Story
description: Set free is Kylies story. It's the third book in a series of three, it can be read on its own, but probably reads better if you have read Taken and Held.In this story, Kylie has hidden her emotions, made herself numb to protect herself. Except where Reagan is concerned, she can't hide herself from him and he's determined not to let her.Reagan has one last plan to break Kylie's apathy, now he just has to convince her.Because he plans to regress her to a little baby girl.This final story involves the consensual regression of an adult to a baby who wears diapers. It also involves spanking and paddling. It should only be brought by adults 18 years and older.
author: Laylah Roberts
